plot: A river, a little village and a lonely childhood are the ingredients for a rich imagination. These are the memories of grandma Ñata told to her grandson - memories from the past, images from the present and a testimony for eternity.
title: El olor de aquel lugar
plot_es: A river, a little village and a lonely childhood are the ingredients for a rich imagination. These are the memories of grandma Ñata told to her grandson - memories from the past, images from the present and a testimony for eternity.
plot_en: A river, a little village and a lonely childhood are the ingredients for a rich imagination. These are the memories of grandma Ñata told to her grandson - memories from the past, images from the present and a testimony for eternity.
